title: Snow Plow Driver
desc:
***Road Salt** (1x, charge 75%)*
All Town players gain roleblock immunity tonight. This registers as a visit to one random Town player. 

***Push Aside** (Locked, 1x, Charge 100%)*
Unlocked when you place in top 3. All non-Town players scoring below 50% will be roleblocked. This registers as a visit to one random player roleblocked. 

***Standby Crew** (passive)*
If you die, you will roleblock all non-Town players scoring below 65% the following night. This registers as a visit to one random player roleblocked. 

***Forecast Awareness** (passive)*
You are immune to rampage attacks.

***Eyes on the Road** (Passive)*
You are immune to roleblocks, and immune to any negative effects potentially triggered by your messages during the day phase.
